subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the significance of the Mehrangarh Fort in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर मेहरांगार के प्रमोट का मतलब है?
A_en: It is a popular tourist destination.
A_hi: इसका एक पसंदीदा टीवीसी के विभिन्न जानकारी के नेतृत्व की जानकारी
B_en: It was built during the reign of Rao Jodhpur.
C_en: It is a symbol of Rajput valor.
D_en: It is the largest fort in Rajasthan.
explanation_en: The correct answer is A because Mehrangarh Fort, built during the reign of Rao Jodhpur, symbolizes the valor of the Rajputs and holds significant historical importance in Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: सहीत, मेहंरगां की संतों की जानकारी
